summary: Ignosticism is the belief that people should avoid taking a position on the existence of God until the concept of God is defined.
full_text:
Ignosticism is the idea that the question of the existence of God is meaningless, because the term "god" has no unambiguous definition. Ignosticism requires a good, non-controversial definition of god before arguing on its existence.
Some philosophers have seen ignosticism as a variation of agnosticism or atheism, whereas others have considered it to be distinct.
title: Ignosticism
